apiTokens.title: API Tokens
apiTokens.description: Manage your API tokens for MCP integration
apiTokens.createTokenDescription: Create a new API token to access the Startup Hub API.
apiTokens.revokeConfirm: Are you sure you want to revoke this token?
apiTokens.revokeWarning: Once revoked, any applications using this token will immediately lose access.
apiTokens.tokenWarning: Make sure to copy your token now. You won't be able to see it again!
apiTokens.tokenLimitWarning: You are approaching your token limit. Consider revoking unused tokens.
apiTokens.tokenLimitReached: Maximum token limit reached. Revoke an existing token to create a new one.
apiTokens.noTokens: No API tokens yet. Create your first token to get started.

hero.title: Discover Early-Stage Startups
hero.subtitle: Connect with founders, find co-founders, and explore innovative ideas in AI and tech.

emptyState.noMatchingDescription: No projects match your current filters. Try adjusting your search criteria.
emptyState.noProjectsDescription: Be the first to share your startup idea with the community!
emptyState.suggestionClearFilters: Clear some filters to see more results

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: Your privacy is important to us. This Privacy Policy explains how Startup Hub collects, uses, and protects your personal information.

collect.title: Information We Collect
collect.content: We collect information you provide directly to us, such as when you create an account, submit a project, or contact us. This may include your name, email address, and any other information you choose to provide.

use.title: How We Use Your Information
use.content: We use the information we collect to provide, maintain, and improve our services, to communicate with you, and to protect our users and platform.

share.title: Information Sharing
share.content: We do not sell your personal information. We may share your information with third-party service providers who assist us in operating our platform, subject to confidentiality obligations.

security.title: Data Security
security.content: We implement appropriate security measures to protect your personal information against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction.

rights.title: Your Rights
rights.content: You have the right to access, update, or delete your personal information at any time through your account settings or by contacting us.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us.

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.intro: Welcome to Startup Hub. By using our service, you agree to these terms. Please read them carefully.

acceptance.title: Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content: By accessing or using Startup Hub, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service and all applicable laws and regulations.

accounts.title: User Accounts
accounts.content: You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account credentials and for all activities that occur under your account.

content.title: User Content
content.content: You retain ownership of content you submit. By posting content, you grant us a license to use, display, and distribute your content on our platform.

prohibited.title: Prohibited Conduct
prohibited.content: You agree not to use the service for any unlawful purpose, to harass others, to submit false information, or to interfere with the proper functioning of the platform.

liability.title: Limitation of Liability
liability.content: Startup Hub is provided "as is" without warranties of any kind. We are not liable for any indirect, incidental, or consequential damages.

changes.title: Changes to Terms
changes.content: We may modify these terms at any time. Continued use of the service after changes constitutes acceptance of the new terms.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitle: We'd love to hear from you
contact.description: Have questions, feedback, or partnership inquiries? Get in touch with us.

form.name: Your Name
form.subject: Subject
form.success: Message sent successfully! We'll get back to you soon.
form.error: Failed to send message. Please try again.

mcp.title: MCP API Documentation
mcp.subtitle: Integrate Startup Hub with AI assistants
mcp.description: The Model Context Protocol (MCP) API allows AI assistants to interact with Startup Hub programmatically.

overview.title: Overview
overview.content: The MCP API provides endpoints for listing projects, creating new projects, managing likes, and more. All endpoints require authentication via Bearer token.

authentication.title: Authentication
authentication.content: All API requests must include an Authorization header with your API token.
authentication.getToken: Get your API token from the

listProjects.title: List Projects
listProjects.description: Get a paginated list of projects with optional filtering.

params.status: Filter by status (IDEA, MVP, BETA, LAUNCHED, PAUSED)

getProject.title: Get Project
getProject.description: Get details of a specific project by slug.

createProject.title: Create Project
createProject.description: Create a new project. Requires create permission.

updateProject.title: Update Project
updateProject.description: Update an existing project. Requires update permission.

deleteProject.title: Delete Project
deleteProject.description: Delete a project. Requires delete permission.

likeProject.title: Like/Unlike Project
likeProject.description: Toggle like status on a project.

rateLimiting.title: Rate Limiting
rateLimiting.content: API requests are limited to 100 requests per minute per token. Rate limit headers are included in all responses.

headers.reset: X-RateLimit-Reset: Time when the rate limit resets

errors.title: Error Handling
errors.content: All errors return a consistent JSON format with an error code and message.

codes.429: Too Many Requests - Rate limit exceeded
